history.text: How did you like the movie the Avengers
I loved it! I thought Robert Downey Jr. was awesome!
He was Awesome, I like Mark Ruffalo playing Bruce Banner. What was your favorite scene
Yeah he was great. My favorite scene was when Nick Fury got all of the superheroes together and recruited them to stop Loki.
That was a really good part. I loved that the movie brought all of my favorite characters to one place.

do you agree with the ratings the movie got on rotte
n tomatoes and meta critic

I really liked that as well! And yes, I do agree with the ratings. It was a wonderful movie and I think a lot of people liked it. And the meta critic score is fair because while it is a good film, it also wasn't ground breaking or revolutionary by any means.
I agree, I thought they rated it very fairly. So you usually try to watch movies based on reviews
I do, however, I don't watch movies just because they got a good rating, but if i find a movie that looks interesting and it has a good rating, i am more inclined to watch it.
I agree, I  try to look at the ratings when i see an interesting movie before i watch it. I actually looked at the rating before I watched the avengers.
I absolutley loved scarlet Johansson and samuel jackson in this film, they were amazing. who was your favorite superhero
I loved  The shocked expression of Loki, after being slammed by Hulk
My favorite super hero is definitely Black Widow. She is so cool!
The scene where The Tesseract opens the worm hole allowing loki to reach earth was intense. do you remember that part?
Yes I remember that part. It was right after that that Loki enslaves Selvig with his scepter right?
Yes, He wanted to aid him in his getaway
Did you like how the movie ended?

I thought it was a good ending,  After The Avengers have defeated the Chitauri army by sending a nuke into their mother ship The Chitauri leader says that the humans are not to be underestimated, and to face them would be “to court Death itself.” So so good.
how did you like it
I thought it was great. The whole movie was action packed and exciting, but the ending really brought it all together.
Yes I agree. I want to go watch it again now.
Same here. Also what did you think about Fury using Coulsons death the motivate the avengers? Do you think it was right of him to do so?
I thought it was smart of him to do, he needed to overpower them publicly to validate himself as the ruler of the earth.
Do you thin them becoming divided made them more susceptible to being overpowered?
You have a good point. And yes I do! They each have their own strengths and weaknesses and when they divided it made it easier for their weaknesses to be taken advantage of.
I agree completely!!
This movie made me laugh a lot. What do you think was the funniest part?
I liked when Agent Coulson Asks Captain America To Sign His Trading Cards. i thought this was very funny

Also when hulk smashed Loki When the Hulk confronted Loki, it looked like we were going to get another rant, as Loki said, “I am a god, you dull creature, and I will not be bullied by…” But Hulk doesn’t wait to hear what comes next, and he grabs Loki and smashes him repeatedly into the ground. Then, Hulk sums it up with two words, “Puny god!”
Haha I really liked those moments too. The second one was my favorite.

Such a great combination of action and humor, made the movie great overall. I will definitely wa
tch this again
How about you

I could not agree more! I also think it had some decent character development. I felt so attached to all of them that when that scene where Stark is falling through the wormhole I almost cried. I was so worried that he was going to die.
I completely forgot about that part, that was such a good part.
Do you think a sequel is coming behind this movie
It really was. I felt so happy when Hulk saved him at the last second.
